Html:
I love this project, first of all.

 

I'm not finding support in the spec for multiline strings.  Couldn't it be the same as C#'s @"

.....

.......

......" multiline string literal support?

 

Or perhaps there is another answer to Google's Closure Templates?

 

Thanks!
+1, that would be a nice feature. I hate typing "...." + [\n] + "...." + ....!
